trans-unit.source: Represents an error that occurred during composition.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref> class with the specified error message.

A message that describes the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref> or `null` to set the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError.Description"></xref> property to an empty string ("").

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref> class with the specified error message and the composition element that is the cause of the composition error.

A message that describes the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref> or `null` to set the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError.Description"></xref> property to an empty string ("").

The composition element that is the cause of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref> or `null` to set the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError.Element"></xref> property to `null`.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref> class with the specified error message and the exception that is the cause of the composition error.

A message that describes the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref> or `null` to set the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError.Description"></xref> property to an empty string ("").

The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError.Exception"></xref> that is the underlying cause of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref> or `null` to set the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError.Exception"></xref> property to `null`.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref> class with the specified error message, and the composition element and exception that are the cause of the composition error.

A message that describes the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref> or `null` to set the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError.Description"></xref> property to an empty string ("").

The composition element that is the cause of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref> or `null` to set the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError.Element"></xref> property to `null`.

The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError.Exception"></xref> that is the underlying cause of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref> or `null` to set the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError.Exception"></xref> property to `null`.
Gets a description of the composition error.
A message that describes the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref>.
Gets the composition element that is the cause of the error.
The composition element that is the cause of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref>.
The default is `null`.
Gets the exception that is the underlying cause of the composition error.
The exception that is the underlying cause of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError"></xref>.
The default is `null`.
Returns a string representation of the composition error.
A string that contains the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.CompositionError.Description"></xref> property.
